items.title: Return to Sender
items.short_description: Tracking the hidden logistics network of Amazon by buying and returning GPS units. In collaboration with Charmaine Chua.

items.title: Why don't the cops fight each other?
items.short_description: A video about the relationships between police officers in the game Grand Theft Auto V (GTA5). My process of hacking the game demonstrates which aspects of play are completely immutable.

items.title: Amazon Box Returned with a Recording Device Inside
items.short_description: An audio recorder hidden in an Amazon return to record the sound of the box in transit all the way to the factory.

items.title: Scrivener
items.short_description: A text-based, AI-assisted role-playing game on Discord, blending D&D mechanics and DAO principles to build a future of resistance and collaboration.

items.title: The Illuminator
items.short_description: The Illuminator is a collaborative political art project which was created in the context of Occupy Wall Street. As a horizontally-managed project, we own two powerful projectors and two heavily-modified vehicles which are used to generate spectacles and interventions in New York City and beyond.

items.title: Poemecia
items.short_description: Poetry created by microbes using search terms tracked by the NSA, then live tweeted.
